Chain.Chain1: Enterprise level and high performance blockchain cloud platform
Chain.Chain3: Databases that share, copy and synchronize among nodes of network nodes through timestamps and digital signatures.
Chain.Chain5: Support Paxos, PBFT, Dpos and other consensus algorithms applicable to industry blockchain network.
Chain.Chain7: Support multi lingual, multi scene online calling, editing and debugging smart contracts, and realizes the contract function quickly and safely.
Chain.Chain9: Provide multiple privacy protection to implement homomorphic encryption algorithm, and supports zero knowledge proof to verify the validity of encrypted data.
Chain.Chain11: Using interconnection chain architecture, consensus mechanism, transmission protocol and privacy protection mechanism, the interconnection between independent blockchain can be realized.

adhibition.adhibition1: Application of rich and diverse scenes
adhibition.adhibition3: Provide funds, resources and service sharing services based on the trusted blockchain. Provide authenticity proof for each transaction link after the user joins the shared platform. Ensure the whole process of the platform to be traced, and improve the credibility of the platform.
adhibition.adhibition5: An integral consortium is formed by a number of institutions, and consumers are consumed by any organization to obtain the points issued by the agency and can be used in any organization in the alliance.
adhibition.adhibition7: Blockchain technology combined with anti-counterfeit labels and Internet of things equipment, can prevent artificial factors caused by false data sources, to ensure that the product information is true and unique, traceability, and tampering.
adhibition.adhibition9: The distributed ledger and smart contract technology of blockchain are used to connect core enterprises, distributors, banks / financial institutions and warehousing companies to realize the registration and sharing of goods information on the chain.

advantage.advantage3: High scalability, high performance, micro service, distributed computing architecture, supporting lateral expansion, providing 10000 level processing power per second, and easily supporting multiple business scenarios.
advantage.advantage5: he bottom layer adopts the database structure and supports data heterogeneity, which supports flexible handover of multiple consensus algorithms, and supports piecewise and multi chain technology to effectively improve the parallel processing capability.
advantage.advantage7: The implementation of the flexible link protocol, through the OpenAPI fast, convenient and efficient docking center system, one key installation, substantially reduce the cost of business development, migration and maintenance.
advantage.advantage9: Perfect user, key, permission management and isolation processing ensure data and account information security, and meet real-time penetration compliance monitoring.

sharing.sharing2: Provid funds,resources and service sharing services based on the trusted blockchain.Provide authenticity proof for rach transaction link after th user joins the shared platform.Ensure the whole process of the plat form to be traced, and improve the credibility of the platform.
sharing.sharing7: Platform can modify the count of users, on the one hand misleads the user to join, and on the other hand, it may cause the sharing of funds into the pocket of the platform.
sharing.sharing9: Due to the lack of effective regulatory regime, the platform can misappropriate shared funds for investment or finance, which is a huge risk for users.

integral.integral2: An integral consortium is formed by a number of institutions,and consumers are consumed by any organization to obtain the points issued by the agency and can be used in any organization in the alliance.
integral.integral7: Consumers can only use the limited export provided by the issuers. However, each issuer needs to build its own export, which is costly and inefficient, and can only be issued by large organizations.
integral.integral9: Merchants are usually passive access integration platform, lack of unified acceptance and settlement mechanism, integral diversion effect is not obvious.
integral.integral11: The upper and lower reaches all need one's own family to promote, very difficult to make big; if all undertake the exchange, will face the cash flow and the risk pressure.

product.product2: Blockchain technology combined with anti-counterfeitlabels and internet of things equipment,can prevent artificial factors caused by false data sources,to ensure that the product information is true and unique,traceability,and tampering.
product.product7: The need to use a credibility tool to identify the authenticity of goods, anti-counterfeit labels can not be physically bound products, and the common label is easily copied, causing 'code wrong', 'one code and many use' and other cases occurred
product.product9: Traditional verification center model, data stored in their own flat mode. In Taichung, it is easy to be tampered with true and false, and the user is poor in the experience of anti-counterfeiting verification operation. It is long and complex from the initial node of the product to the middle chain of the consumer terminal, and it is difficult to grasp the specific control of each node.

financial.financial2: The distributed ledger and smart contract technology of blockchain are used to connect core enterprises,distributors,banks / financial institutions and warehousing companies to realize the registrantion and sharing of goods information on the chain.
financial.financial6: Non unified ERP systems between institutions / enterprises, information forming isolated islands cannot be shared.
financial.financial8: Trust can only be transmitted between core enterprises and first level suppliers, other links lack low cost trust transfer tools or means.
financial.financial10: The payment settlement between suppliers and suppliers can not be automated.
financial.financial12: Small and medium-sized enterprises lack trust endorsement on the chain, so it is hard to get the approval of the capital side

about.about2: 90chain is the leading block chain technology company in China. The company focuses on the innovation of block chain technology and product. It has developed high performance and high performance and high availability block chain basic service platform. It has the ability to quickly build upper application business and meet the scene of large-scale users.90chain has been widely used in the fields of digital assets, trade finance, equity bond, supply chain finance, commercial integration, joint credit, public notarization, electronic invoice, data security and so on.In the future, we will work together with a large number of like-minded partners to jointly study the underlying technology of the block chain and promote the application of block chain technology in various commercial fields. We will jointly establish a distributed and trustworthy and distributed business environment with transparent information, synergy and high efficiency.
about.about3: Co-create new era of blockchain business
about.about4: 1.Based on the research of (Hyperledger Fabric) and BCOS project, using the open source and Commercial property of research projects to innovation in design and application the underlying structure of blockchain.
about.about5: 2.Enterprise-level application implementation based on the BaaS open platform of Trustsql. The application practice has been carried out at the level of member digital assets of the Jiuling e-commerce business scene, and the 《Jiuling Blockchain Integrated Application System 1.0》 has been formed.
about.about6: 3.Providing blockchain solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises, conducting enterprise chain scenario analysis, alliance chain erection, chain code (Intelligent contract) and blockchain browser development, etc.
about.about8: We have a high level R & D team and a professional operation team.
about.about10: For small and medium enterprises in China to solve difficulties and pain points.
